page.title: 13LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: THESE ARE VARIED,SOME PEOPLE FOLLOW OR TAKE PART IN SOME FORM OF SPORT SUCH AS FOOTBALL,SQUASH OR TENNIS.TO DO THIS THEY WILL LIKELY TRAVEL IN TO EXETER.THE NEAREST CINEMAS AND THEATRES ARE IN EXETER ALTHOUGH THOSE IN TORBAY ARE ONLY 30 MINUTES DRIVE AWAY. THE VILLAGES CONTAIN THREE PUBLIC HOUSES, THE MOST WELL KNOWN IS THE LEY ARMS AT KENN. THESE PUBLIC HOUSES SELL BEERS,CIDERS,SPIRITS AND WINES AND SERVE SIMPLE MEALS. FOR OTHERS THERE ARE RESTUARANTS WHICH SELL BETTER AND MORE EXPENSIVE MEALS. FOR THOSE WHO WISH TO SAY AT HOME MOST HOMES HAVE COLOUR TELEVISIONS WHICH PROVIDE A CHOICE OF 4 PROGRAMMES OR PEOPLE CAN LISTEN TO TWO LOCAL RADIO STATIONS.
